attributes.action: Lower the amount of tax on fuel!
attributes.additional_details: Reduce the amount of tax paid on fuel at the pump.
attributes.background: The amount of tax customers pay on fuel is unsustainable, the speed in which price increases are on the rise on top of other energy bills is going to hurt nearly every family out there.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Reduce fuel duty and VAT by 40% for a period of 2 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089

Stop charging VAT on fuel duty: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599411

Temporarily suspend all taxes on all fuels and energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610585

Suspend VAT on road fuels to reduce fuel costs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567
